TV Price List in India

Looking to buy a new TV? Browse through our list of televisions with prices and specifications in India, featuring a wide range of the latest, new, and upcoming TVs from popular brands like Xiaomi, Realme, Samsung, LG, OnePlus, Sony, and more.

Over the years, TVs have drastically evolved in design and technology, with smart features that enhance your entertainment experience. From watching movies and playing games to streaming your favorite shows and using them as a music player, TVs are a great addition to any household.

With various types of displays like LED, LCD, OLED, and QLED, the price of TVs varies based on specifications and features. If you're having trouble finding the right TV for your home, we've made it easier for you to select TVs based on your preferences. We've highlighted the price and major details such as display type and size, smart features, power supply, connectivity options, etc.

Before making a purchase, it's always advisable to check user reviews, ratings, and features of all the products carefully. This will help you make an informed decision about the TV that's best suited for your needs. Our price list is regularly updated, so you can be sure that you're getting the latest information. This price list was last updated on September 13, 2023.

TVs Price List
TVPriceAvailable From
